attributes.action: Delay the university exam period for a reasonable time amidst COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: To prevent the spread of COVID-19 and the risk of students’ future.
attributes.background: We wish Parliament use supreme legislative power to delay the university exam period for a reasonable time. The university is potentially closed as the spread of coronavirus, and we probably cannot borrow essential books from the library during the revision period. Hence, our future is at risk.

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
